isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 1.7: VEHICLE FEATURES - STANDARD FEATURES - CHANGE OIL LIGHT (COL)

svcproc.title: CHANGE OIL LIGHT (COL)
svcproc.para: The Change Oil Light (COL) feature automatically alerts the vehicle operator that a pre-determined oil change interval in miles or engine hours has been accumulated. The owner of the vehicle can customize the oil change intervals by programming the desired values in the ECM's memory.
The COL light/timer can be reset with the STI button. To utilize this feature, the following steps must be followed:

item.para: Depress and hold the STI button.
Depress and release the accelerator pedal five times.
